### Overview
Statistics Canada is seeking an Information Technology (IT) Accessibility Management specialist under the TBIPS – IT Accessibility Management specialist category. Interested parties must hold a valid Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat procurement tool profile (TBIPS SA) for Tier 1 under the EN578-170432 series.

### Procurement Details
#### Tender Title and Category
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued under the title TBIPS – IT Accessibility Management specialist, with the category code being D302A (Informatics Professional Services).

#### Publication and Closing Dates
The RFP was published on 2022-08-09 and the tender closing date is set for 2022-09-15T14:00:00.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation process will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

### Security Requirements
Applicants and personnel hired for the contract will be subject to a reliability status assessment upon contract award.

### Duration and Location of Contract
The contract is intended to result in the award of one (1) contract with a period from contract award date to March 31, 2023, plus three (3) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

### Additional Resources
For additional information, please refer to the attached documents:

* [J061359-A NPP v1.3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/d6741399d58c3fe0ca5a044ca2f02e9f/j061359-a_npp_v1.3.pdf)
* [J061359-A APM v1.3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/fc4b16902867b792d7d04d800e7364a1/j061359-a_apm_v1.3.pdf)
